action.action-desc: Ms. Collins (for herself and Ms. Baldwin) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the program relating to lifespan respite care, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Lifespan Respite Care Reauthorization Act of 2025.

section.header: Reauthorization of lifespan respite care program

subsection.text: Section 2901(5) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300ii(5)) is amended by striking unpaid adult and inserting unpaid individual.
